mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay_order_user (order_num, pk_no, id, order_date, total_price, imp_uid, user_count, sayong_pointeu, product_name, airplane) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{pkNo}, #{id}, #{orderDate}, #{totalPrice}, #{impUid}, #{userCount}, #{sayongPointeu}, #{productName}, #{airplane});
INSERT INTO pay_order_user (order_num, id, total_price, imp_uid, user_count, airplane) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{id}, #{ftPrice}, #{impUid}, #{ftPeple}, #{airplane});
insert into sc_pay (id, order_num, pay_method, product_name, pay_amount, pk_no, sayong_pointeu) values (#{id}, #{orderNum}, #{payMethod}, #{productName}, #{payAmount}, #{pkNo}, #{sayongPointeu})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sc_pay WHERE pay_num = (SELECT MAX(pay_num) FROM sc_pay)
